title: How to load symbols from Windows DBG file
content:
I'm having trouble getting GHIDRA to load symbols for a Microsoft EXE from an accompanying DBG file.  Perhaps I'm just overlooking some obvious documentation in which case a focussed link would be much appreciated.

Things I've tried:

Background:

In case this really is a dead end I added a related question.

comments.text: Hi and welcome to RE.SE. Wasn't that some awkward proprietary format unrelated to both PDB and the older CV (also with .dbg file extension)? In all tools I had to deal with similar cases I had to resort to the map file.
